item.title: 十年来最大流动性缺口引发对印度央行之手的猜测
item.description: 在中央银行可能出售美元以抑制卢比波动之后，印度银行系统的流动性赤字达到了十多年来的最高水平。【原文：The liquidity deficit in the Indian banking system hit the highest level in over a decade following likely dollar sales by the central bank to curb rupee volatility.】

item.title: 马来西亚反贪污抗议活动将就改革问题向安瓦尔施压
item.description: 马来西亚计划于周六在吉隆坡举行反腐抗议活动，再次向马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣施压，要求他加快改革步伐，严厉打击腐败。【原文：An anti-corruption protest is planned for Saturday in Kuala Lumpur to renew pressure on Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim to speed up reforms and clamp down harder on corruption.】

item.title: 韩国锌业在激烈的股东大会后伸出橄榄枝
item.description: 韩国锌业公司（Korea Zinc Co. Ltd.）的高级管理人员周五试图表达一种和解的基调，并表示愿意与该公司的第一大股东和收购方合作，即使在该金属巨头试图限制投票权的投资者会议风波之后也是如此。【原文：Senior executives of Korea Zinc Co. sought to strike a conciliatory tone on Friday and offered to cooperate with the company’s top shareholder and suitor, even after a stormy investor meeting where the metals giant sought to restrict voting rights.】

item.title: 俄罗斯称防御系统击退今年最大规模无人机袭击
item.description: 俄罗斯击退了乌克兰今年迄今为止针对十多个地区的最猛烈无人机袭击，据报道至少有一架飞机在炼油厂附近被击落。【原文：Russia repelled the heaviest Ukrainian drone attack so far this year that targeted more than a dozen regions, with at least one of the aircraft reportedly downed near an oil refinery.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑跳涨，英国股市将维持在纪录附近
电池制造商 LG Energy 因电动汽车需求风险而削减开支
item.description: 电池制造商 LG Energy Solution Ltd. 表示，由于全球电动汽车行业存在重大不确定性，该公司将大幅削减今年的支出，但预计销售额将出现反弹。【原文：Battery maker LG Energy Solution Ltd. said it will make major cuts to spending this year, though it expects a rebound in sales, as major uncertainties hang over the global electric vehicle sector.】

item.title: Monte Paschi 向 Mediobanca 提出全股收购要约
item.description: Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA 周五发起了对 Mediobanca SpA 的收购要约。【原文：Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA launched a takeover bid for Mediobanca SpA on Friday.】

item.title: 爱立信未达预期，印度市场销售持续低迷
item.description: 爱立信公司（Ericsson AB）第四季度的收益未能达到分析师的预期，原因是对印度销售的预期反弹在这一时期未能实现。【原文：Ericsson AB earnings missed analysts’ forecasts in the fourth quarter, as an expected rebound in sales to India didn’t materialize in the period.】

item.title: 炙手可热的韩国股票大涨 250% 后，对冲基金看到了进一步的收益
item.description: 韩国一家辣味方便面生产商的股票大涨 250%，帮助一些对冲基金渡过了去年亚洲表现最差的市场。他们打赌，该公司股票将在 2025 年继续上涨。【原文：A 250% jump in a South Korean spicy instant noodle maker’s stock helped some hedge funds ride out Asia’s worst performing market last year. And they are betting that the stock will extend its gains in 2025.】

item.title: 习近平访问中国钢铁企业引发股价反弹
item.description: 在国家主席习近平参观了中国第二大钢铁制造商的一家工厂，并强调支持他所称的 "重要基础产业 "之后，该公司股价大涨，突破了日涨幅限制。【原文：Shares in a unit of China’s No. 2 steelmaker rallied by their daily limit after President Xi Jinping toured one the firm’s plants and emphasized support for what he called “an important foundational industry.”】

item.title: 印度一月份经济活动有所放缓，PMI快报显示
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一项即时调查显示，2025 年伊始，印度私营企业增长放缓，服务业失去了增长势头，而制造业活动依然强劲。【原文：India’s private sector companies started 2025 with a slowdown in growth with services sector losing momentum even as manufacturing activity remained strong, a flash survey by HSBC Holdings Plc showed.】

item.title: 夜间吠叫的狗也会咬人吗？
item.description:
市场正在认识到，特朗普2.0没有贯彻执行其声明的余地。【原文：

Markets are getting the idea that Trump 2.0 doesn’t have the leeway to follow through on pronouncements.

】

item.title: 流亡海外的西藏领导人说，特朗普的关税政策需要压制中国
item.description: 西藏流亡政府领导人表示，他欢迎美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对中国采取任何严厉的经济措施。【原文：The head of Tibet’s government-in-exile said he would welcome any harsh economic measures against China by US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 甲骨文、苹果和谷歌在是否继续为 TikTok 提供服务的问题上意见不一
item.description:
科技巨头对如何解释特朗普拯救 TikTok 的 EO 存在分歧

Tech giants differ on how to interpret Trump’s EO saving TikTok

】

item.title: 民意调查显示：欧洲央行面临价格坚挺问题，这削弱了其减持的理由
item.description: 据彭博社对经济学家的调查显示，对通货膨胀的担忧正在卷土重来，从而引发了欧洲中央银行何时可能需要在春季暂停或停止降息的问题。【原文：Inflation concerns are staging a comeback, raising questions over when the European Central Bank may need to pause or halt interest-rate reductions in the spring, according to a Bloomberg survey of economists.】

item.title: 英国金边债券收益率上升后，市政厅减少了道路施工
item.description: 英国借贷成本上升加剧了英国地方议会的财政危机，市政厅不得不取消或推迟道路工程、新休闲中心和城市改造等项目。【原文：A financial crisis at British local councils has been compounded by the country’s rising borrowing costs, with town halls scrapping or delaying projects such as roadworks, new leisure centers and urban regeneration.】

item.title: 欧洲人敦促特朗普在乌克兰保障问题上发挥作用
item.description: 随着结束俄罗斯入侵的外交压力不断增大，欧洲官员正在寻求美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的新政府承诺参与乌克兰的安全保障。【原文：European officials are seeking commitments from the new US administration of President Donald Trump to take part in security guarantees for Ukraine as diplomatic pressure to end the Russian invasion mounts.】

item.title: 英国零售业成本飙升，塞恩斯伯里裁员只是开始
item.description: 英国的零售商面临着不得不削减更多的工作岗位、与工会进行更激烈的讨价还价，以及错开加薪时间，以消化今年开始实施的政府增收预算中的震荡性增税。【原文：Britain’s retailers face having to cut more jobs, drive harder bargains with labor unions and stagger pay increases to absorb the shock tax rises in the government’s revenue-raising budget that kick in this year.】

item.title: 中国太阳能硅出口量首次超过进口量
item.description: 去年，中国太阳能产业使用的多晶硅出口量首次超过进口量，因为电池板制造商将更多业务转移到海外，以应对国内供应过剩的局面。【原文：China’s exports of polysilicon used by the solar industry exceeded imports last year for the first time, as panel manufacturers shifted more operations overseas to contend with a glut at home.】

item.title: 策略师称日本央行鹰派信号将提振日元
item.description: 据策略师称，日本央行在上调基准利率时发出鹰派信号后，日元有望进一步走高。【原文：The yen is primed for further gains after the Bank of Japan sent hawkish signals while raising the benchmark rate, according to strategists.】

item.title: 特朗普 "咬 "得比 "叫 "得还难听，新兴市场货币得到缓解
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫后的第一周，新兴市场的货币交易商们正在庆祝小胜。【原文：In the first week since Donald Trump returned to the White House, emerging-market currency traders are celebrating the small wins.】

item.title: 阿亚拉科技集团关闭中国工厂，加快全球撤退步伐
item.description: 菲律宾企业集团阿亚拉公司（Ayala Corp）旗下的集成微电子公司（Integrated Micro-Electronics, Inc.【原文：Integrated Micro-Electronics, Inc., a unit of Philippine conglomerate Ayala Corp., is shutting down one of its facilities in China as part of broader efforts to cut costs.】

item.title: 分析师称中国新规将为市场增加 1,380 亿美元收入
item.description: 分析人士认为，中国的最新举措将在 2025 年为疲软的股市注入至少 1 万亿元人民币（1,380 亿美元）的额外资金，摩根大通公司最看好的计算结果是，三年内总额将达到 13 万亿元人民币。【原文：Analysts see China’s latest initiatives injecting at least 1 trillion yuan ($138 billion) of additional flows in 2025 into its ailing stock market, with the most bullish calculation by JPMorgan Chase & Co. totaling 13 trillion yuan over three years.】

item.title: 日本央行加息后日元波动，交易员等待上田的消息
item.description: 在日本央行自 7 月份以来首次提高利率后，日元兑美元汇率波动剧烈。【原文：The yen fluctuated in choppy trading versus the dollar after the Bank of Japan raised interest rates for the first time since July.】

item.title: 债权人称法院应调查中国公司的欺诈行为
item.description: 中国最大建筑公司海外分支的一名债权人要求美国破产法院协助调查该公司是否可能存在欺诈行为。【原文：A creditor to an overseas arm of China’s largest construction company is asking a US bankruptcy court to help investigate whether the firm may have committed fraud.】

item.title: 日本央行将利率上调至 2008 年以来最高水平
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫继续其回归央行正统的使命，周五将其关键政策利率上调至 17 年来最高水平。【原文：The Bank of Japan raised its key policy rate Friday to the highest level in 17 years, as Governor Kazuo Ueda continues his mission to return to central bank orthodoxy.】

item.title: 加密货币认为特朗普的命令为友好规则开辟了快速通道
item.description: 数字资产行业终于迎来了唐纳德-特朗普总统的支持性行政措施，结束了焦急的等待，开启了朝着友好监管背景快速迈进的诱人前景。【原文：The digital-asset sector finally received a supportive executive action from President Donald Trump, ending an anxious wait and opening up the tantalizing prospect of rapid progress toward a friendly regulatory backdrop.】

item.title: 价值 7.6 亿美元的美国-新加坡海底电缆获得批准
item.description: 据吉宝有限公司（Keppel Ltd.）称，第一个直接连接新加坡和美国西海岸的海底电缆系统已获得美国颁发的登陆许可证，这将进一步推动新加坡成为亚洲领先的数字枢纽。【原文：The first subsea cable system directly connecting Singapore to the American west coast has been granted a landing license by the US, according to Keppel Ltd., bolstering the city-state’s push as Asia’s leading digital hub.】

item.title: 船舶堆积，液化天然气运价跌至历史最低水平
item.description: 液化天然气运输成本急剧下降，因为市场上船只过剩，这一情况可能会减轻天然气进口商的负担，并有助于提高贸易商的利润。【原文：Liquefied natural gas shipping costs are plummeting as the market grapples with a glut of vessels, a development that could provide relief for gas importers and help pad profits for traders.】

item.title: 印度购房者迎来好消息，地产股感受到热度
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】
